definition: flower/blossom/CL:朵[duo3],支[zhi1],束[shu4],把[ba3],盆[pen2],簇[cu4]/fancy pattern/florid/to spend (money, time)/(coll.) lecherous/lustful
news from behind the scenes/stage gossip

sentences.english: Here is the "making of" taken in Athens and Santorini.
sentences.chinese: 这是于雅典及圣托里尼拍照时的花絮。

sentences.english: Works Connection is responsible for making this gem sparkle with an assortment of anodized tidbits.
sentences.chinese: 工程连接负责本闪耀宝石与各种各样的阳极花絮。
新增华仔天地会员活动花絮视频。

sentences.english: There are lots of tidbits you can extract from your inbox.
sentences.chinese: 从你的收件箱中可以挖掘出很多花絮出来。

sentences.english: LW: Were there any interesting moments behind the scenes that you would like to share?
sentences.chinese: 有什么有趣的幕后花絮是妳想和大家分享的？

sentences.english: Here, a behind-the-scenes look at a southern ground hornbill on set.
sentences.chinese: 这是一张花絮照，被拍摄的是一只南方犀鸟。

sentences.english: This is the making of the Snicker TVC.
sentences.chinese: 这是飞跃道为士力架拍摄广告时的制作花絮。

sentences.english: The three actors talk about the most exciting scenes both on and off the screen.
sentences.chinese: 三位演员也将讲述台前幕后最激动人心的花絮。

best of the best/collection of the best (of sth)

fragment (of speech etc)/extract (from book etc)/episode (of story etc)
